Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationships of de novo designed cyclic antimicrobial peptides based on gramicidin S.
Literature.Author: Lee DL, Hodges RS

Literature.Title: Effect of ring size on conformation and biological activity of cyclic cationic antimicrobial peptides.
